title: Jesters from The Triumph of Maximilian I
description: Plates 27-28 (double-page); car drawn by wild ponies, led by Conrad von der Rosen on horseback, dressed as a jester; a personal friend and confidant of the emperor whose life he is said to have saved more than once. Jesters: Le-- and Caspar, Bauer, Meteschy, and Dyweynndl.
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
